entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade has been decreased to low.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Freezing level 2400 metres. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade has been decreased to low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow flurries are possible about the summit from this evening until early Saturday morning, although little if any snow is expected to accumulate on the road. Note: brief snow flurries are possible about the summit again Saturday evening.
